TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaForeignKeyColumn extends System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 所使用的資料庫外部索引鍵欄位。

span.span: Represents a database foreign-key field that is used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET Dynamic Data 應用程式中，類別代表表示一對一關聯性的資料庫資料行。In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the class represents a database column that denotes a one-to-one relationship. 類別代表包含外部索引鍵欄位的資料表中的資料行。The class represents the column in the table that contains the foreign-key field. 不過，您可以藉由存取父資料表物件屬性。However, you can access the parent table object by using the property. 您可以判斷的外部索引鍵欄位是包含所使用的資料表中主索引鍵屬性。You can determine if the foreign-key field is a primary key in the table that contains it by using the property.

param.span: 字典物件，包含資料欄位的新值。

span.span: A dictionary object that contains the new values for a data field.
The value of the foreign key.

summary.span: 在指定的字典中儲存外部索引鍵的值。

span.span: Saves the value of a foreign key in the specified dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來將外部索引鍵的值儲存在字典，其中包含所有資料欄位的新值。The method is used to save the value of a foreign key in the dictionary that contains all the new values for a data field. 一般而言，從選取的新值時，方法用外部索引鍵欄位的控制項。Typically, the method is used when a new value is selected from a control for the foreign key field.

span.span: Gets a collection that contains the names of the foreign keys in the association that represents a database relationship.

value.span: 包含外部索引鍵名稱的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the names of the foreign keys.

span.span: The name of the foreign key.

summary.span: 傳回對應至外部索引鍵的替代名稱。

span.span: Returns the alternate name that is mapped to a foreign key.

returns.span: 對應至外部索引鍵的替代名稱。

span.span: The alternate name that is mapped to the foreign key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回而不是實際的外部索引鍵名稱的篩選運算式中使用的替代名稱。This method returns the alternate name that is used in a filtering expression instead of the actual foreign-key name. 如果不存在的替代名稱，則方法會傳回外部索引鍵的實際名稱。If an alternate name does not exist, the method returns the actual name of the foreign key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回詳細資料的 [動作] 頁面上為 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 應用程式定義的路由為基礎的路徑。The method returns the path for the details action page based on the routes defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application. 這個方法會傳回空字串，如果`row`是`null`。This method returns an empty string, if `row` is `null`. 使用方法是叫用相同方法傳遞的第一個參數的動作。Using the method is the same as invoking the method passing the action as the first parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法直接呼叫這個方法。This method cannot be called directly. 若要自訂初始化，您可以從這個類別衍生，並覆寫方法。To customize initialization, you can derive from this class and override the method. 如果您覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底控制項`Initialize`方法。If you override this method, call the base control's `Initialize` method.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示外部索引鍵欄位是否屬於資料表的主索引鍵。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the foreign-key field is part of the primary key of the table.

span.span: if the foreign-key field is part of the primary key of the table; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來決定的外部索引鍵欄位是否為資料表的主索引鍵的一部分。Use the property to determine whether the foreign-key field is part of the primary key of the table. 這是包含外部索引鍵欄位不是父資料表的資料表。This is the table that contains the foreign-key field not the parent table.
